title: What even...
body: Ok so I am silver 3, Been playing this game for a while now on and off. Trying to get up to gold but how is it even possible with teams like this.. What are you supposed to do. This isn't even a 1 off thing. Not saying I'm the best player or even close to but how are you supposed to climb when this happens.

replies.body: Shit jungler. Your lanes are losing so you should help them, not complain.

Sometimes you get the 0/22/2 mid and bot lane combo, sometimes it's the other team.

So games you can't win, but on that, some games you can't lose either. :D

I'd bet that Annie and Ekko had an argument in champion select, and both of them were less focused on actually playing the game.

Learn when to dodge and avoid teams that are like this.

Some games you cant win. This is one of those games. There will be an equal amount of games that you cant lose, no matter how badly you play. The only player you control is you. If you want to climb, focus on tipping the scales in the 10-20% of games where the teams are somewhat evenly matched and your play will be what decides the outcome of the game.

The games you should be mad about losing are the close ones, where if YOU had played slightly better you could have won.

Trust me, it could be worse. I changed my name for a reason.

But really it's kind of the job experience paradox in most cases. There's a reason you can't advance (a common one is not knowing how to carry properly), so you play games to get experience fixing that problem, but because of that problem you're put into positions where you can't get that experience.

In your case from those scores, I'm guessing it was the "every lane dead before the second minion wave" scenario, which unless you're good enough you can't do anything to fix, but if you WERE that good you wouldn't be there in the first place. And that's our low elo ranked system ladies and gentlemen.
Duo. Reduce the unknown retard factor by 1. Worked for me. Went from being "stuck" in Silver 3 to Gold 2 in about 60 games
